mapper.insert: insert into option_value values(seq_option_value_no.nextval, #{optionValue}, #{optionValueCost},(select option_no from (select * from product_option order by 1 desc) where rownum = 1))
mapper.select: select a.option_no, a.option_name, LISTAGG(b.option_value, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY option_value) as option_values from product_option a, option_value b where a.option_no = b.option_no group by a.option_no, a.option_name
